articles.title: Indonesia's Mount Lewotobi Laki-laki erupts
articles.content: JAKARTA: Indonesia's Mount Lewotobi Laki-laki in East Nusa Tenggara Province erupted on Friday (Aug 1), spewing a more than 10km high ash column, the country's volcanology agency said

articles.title: What screen time does to children's brains is more complicated than it seems
articles.content: Zoe will be responding to reader comments about this article between 11am and 12pm (BST) today. So I told him it was time to stop. A full-blown tantrum erupted. My older children are navigating social media, virtual reality and online gaming, and sometimes that concerns me too. I hear them tease each other about needing to "touch grass" â€“ disconnect from the tech and get outdoors.
